issue.title: [CF 669] Dire Beast Uptime Tracking
issue.body:
Hey so I can't seem to be able to create a icon with tracking for Dire Beast the Hunter spell. I have tried both debuff and buff even though it isn't either of those as well as combat event spell summon and create for pet. I may be just missing something entirely but is there a way to track the uptime on this spell, and by that I mean the duration the beast is up. Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Rasca1 | Imported from CurseForge issue #669 | Raw

comments.body:
This is the icon that I use for this:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sicd ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^S120679:~`15 ^SShowWhen^N1 ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SEnabled^B ^SICDType^Sspellcast ^t^N60345^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/general/25135-how-to-import-strings/

Edited Oct 22, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
